display_name: Horne-Ostberg Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire: Time of day reaching "feeling best" peak
description:
Item from the modified Horne-Ostberg Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire. [Horne JA and Ostberg O, 1976 (PubMed ID: 1027738)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1027738)

Original question: *19. At what time of the day do you think that you reach your "feeling best" peak?*

[Search for all HOMEQ variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=homeq)
